mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.xuesheng_uuid_number as xueshengUuidNumber ,a.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,a.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,a.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,a.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.yuanxi_types as yuanxiTypes ,a.banji_types as banjiTypes ,a.xuesheng_email as xueshengEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM xuesheng a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.xuesheng_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengUuidNumber},'%')
and a.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and a.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and a.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.yuanxi_types = #{params.yuanxiTypes}
and a.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
and a.xuesheng_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
